text: Deng Yu (2Deng Yu's biography in Book of the Later Han indicated that he was 57 (by East Asian reckoning) when be died. Thus by calculation, his birth year should be 2 AD.â€“58 AD5th month of the 1st year of the Yong'ping era, per Emperor Ming's biography in Book of the Later Han.) was a statesman and military commander in Eastern Han dynasty. He contributed to the unification of China. In 57 AD, Deng became Grand Tutor. He held this title until his death. ==References== Category:2 births Category:58 deaths
title: Deng Yu
